csf_subcategory_name: Organizational cybersecurity policy is established and communicated
Resources are prioritized based on classification, criticality, and business value.
Communications and control networks are protected
The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events
Physical environment is monitored for security events
Unauthorized changes to systems are monitored
A baseline of network operations is established and managed
Legal and regulatory requirements are managed
Response plans are improved following lessons learned
Recovery strategies are improved following exercises
Recovery policies and procedures are established
